values: Wow, how about some nice rain to set the depressing mood? Whoo! I had a nice conversation with a boy last night. It's kinda funny how all of my conversations with him somehow become long and meaningful out of nowhere. I try not to think much of it. I now know that he dreams about me... in that way... I'm almost happy about myself now. I never thought that a boy would have those kinds of dreams about someone like myself. Horay for me. I shall be going over to his house with another boy to have a Halo contest today. Then it'll be time to kick ass. I'm the best at the game, especially at the Warthog. Yesterday was so boring... I didn't do much except maybe walk to the A & P to get my dad a late father's day present. I couldn't go on father's day because I had Ram over for the first time in a year. I really hate the fact that I moved here, I want to go back to brooklyn so I can see Ram more. It's just so boring and quiet in New Jersey... Um... yeah... I think that's the end of my rantings for today. Peace.

Wow. I mean holy shit. I actually made a halfway decent journal layout. I didn't think I could do that. Horay for me.

   I don't know why I started this thing. I don't expect many people to read this let alone even know it's there. I can pretend I care. I've got nothing better to do with my time anyway. I won't be doing anything this summer other then maybe sitting in front of the computer and going to summer school... Christ. Of all people, I never thought I'd have to go to summer school. Being seen with those people as we were led away from graduation practice was horrible. I am ashamed. This just leads to another lesson in life. I'll learn from it and try harder next year.

   Um... I have nothing to do today. Maybe I'll go for a walk... damn, it's hot out... or is it just me? ...
For my first day on livejournal I think I'm doing okay. I need to get the layout done... this is way to complex for my limited brain capacity to understand. ahaha...
